instructions: Go to Settings > Passwords & Accounts. Tap Google, sign in to your account, then turn on Contacts.
Go to Settings > Passwords & Accounts. Tap Exchange, sign in to your Exchange account, then turn on Contacts.
Go to Settings > Passwords & Accounts > Add Account > Other. Tap Add LDAP Account or Add CardDAV Account, then enter the account information.
Tap Groups, then tap the GAL, CardDAV, or LDAP directory you want to search. Tap Done, then enter your search. Tap the person s name to save their info to your contacts.
